metadata.title: Arctic ARGOS Drifter Data

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: Argos drifters were deployed in the western Arctic and Greenland Sea to assess sea ice drift and current regimes. High resolution time series data include zonal and meridional currents, drifter velocity, barometric pressure and air temperature measurements. Drifter data was collected hourly.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To assess sea ice drift and current regimes in high latitude seas.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: As Needed

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
